trans-unit.source: Firefox requires Face ID to access your saved passwords and payment methods.

trans-unit.source: Making Firefox your default browser is a vote for an open, accessible internet.
trans-unit.target: ການເຮັດໃຫ້ Firefox ເປັນຕົວທ່ອງເວັບເລີ່ມຕົ້ນຂອງທ່ານເປັນການລົງຄະແນນສຽງສໍາລັບອິນເຕີເນັດທີ່ເປີດ, ເຂົ້າເຖິງໄດ້.

trans-unit.note: Title for small home tab banner that allows the user to switch their default browser to Firefox.

trans-unit.note: Description for small home tab banner that allows the user to switch their default browser to Firefox.

trans-unit.source: Choose Firefox as your default browser to make speed, safety, and privacy automatic.
trans-unit.target: ເລືອກ Firefox ເປັນຕົວທ່ອງເວັບເລີ່ມຕົ້ນຂອງທ່ານເພື່ອເຮັດໃຫ້ຄວາມໄວ, ຄວາມປອດໄພ, ແລະຄວາມເປັນສ່ວນຕົວອັດຕະໂນມັດ.
trans-unit.note: Description for small home tab banner that allows the user to switch their default browser to Firefox.

trans-unit.source: Firefox blocks 3,000+ trackers per user each month on average. Make us your default browser for privacy peace of mind.

trans-unit.target: 1 ຈາກ %d ໄຟລ໌
trans-unit.note: The description text in the Download progress toast for showing the number of files when multiple files are downloading. %d is the total number of files.

The description text in the Download progress toast for showing the number of files (%1$@) and download progress (%2$@). This string only consists of two placeholders for purposes of displaying two other strings side-by-side where %1$@ is Downloads.Toast.MultipleFiles.DescriptionText and %2$@ is Downloads.Toast.Progress.DescriptionText. This string should only consist of the two placeholders side-by-side separated by a single space and %1$@ should come before %2$@ everywhere except for right-to-left locales.
The description text in the Download progress toast for showing the downloaded file size (%1$@) out of the total expected file size (%2$@).

trans-unit.source: Warning: we can’t confirm your connection to this website is secure.
trans-unit.target: ຄຳເຕືອນ: ພວກເຮົາບໍ່ສາມາດຍືນຍັນໄດ້ວ່າການເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ຂອງທ່ານໄປຫາເວັບໄຊທ໌ນີ້ມີຄວາມປອດໄພບໍ່.
trans-unit.note: Warning text when clicking the Advanced button on error pages

trans-unit.source: It may be a misconfiguration or tampering by an attacker. Proceed if you accept the potential risk.
trans-unit.target: ມັນອາດຈະເກີດມາຈາກການຕັ້ງຄ່າຜິດພາດ ຫລື ເປັນການດັດແປງໂດຍນັກເຈາະຂໍ້ມູນ. ດຳເນີນການຕໍ່ໄປຖ້າຫາກວ່າທ່ານຍອມຮັບຄວາມສ່ຽງທີ່ອາດເກີດຂື້ນນີ້ໄດ້.
trans-unit.note: Additional warning text when clicking the Advanced button on error pages

trans-unit.source: The owner of %@ has configured their website improperly. To protect your information from being stolen, Firefox has not connected to this website.
trans-unit.target: ເຈົ້າຂອງ %@ ໄດ້ຕັ້ງຄ່າເວັບໄຊທ໌ຂອງພວກເຂົາບໍ່ເຫມາະສົມ. ເພື່ອເປັນການປົກປ້ອງຂໍ້ມູນຂອງທ່ານຈາກການຖືກໂຈລະກຳ, Firefox ຈຶ່ງໄດ້ຕັດການເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ໄປຫາເວັບໄຊທ໌ນີ້.
trans-unit.note: Warning text on the certificate error page. %@ is the domain of the website.

trans-unit.note: The title that shows the number of content cookies blocked

trans-unit.note: The title that shows the number of cross-site URLs blocked

trans-unit.target: ຕົວຂຸດຫລຽນດິຈິຕໍລ
trans-unit.note: The title that shows the number of cryptomining scripts blocked

trans-unit.source: Websites may load outside ads, videos, and other content that contains hidden trackers. Blocking this can make websites load faster, but some buttons, forms, and login fields, might not work.
trans-unit.target: ເວັບໄຊທອາດຈະບໍ່ໂຫລດໂຄສະນາ, ວິດີໂອ ແລະ ເນື້ອຫາອື່ນໆທີ່ມີຕົວຕິດຕາມເຊື່ອງຢູ່. ການບັອກນີ້ຈະເຮັດໃຫ້ເວັບໄຊທສາມາດໂຫລດໄດ້ໄວຂື້ນ ແຕ່ວ່າຈະມີບາງປຸ່ມ, ຟອມ ແລະ ບ່ອນລັອກອິນອາດຈະບໍ່ເຮັດວຽກ.
trans-unit.note: Description of content trackers.

trans-unit.source: These cookies follow you from site to site to gather data about what you do online. They are set by third parties such as advertisers and analytics companies.
trans-unit.target: ຄຸກກີ້ເຫລົ່ານີ້ຈະຕິດຕາມທຸກເວັບໄຊທທີ່ທ່ານເຂົ້າໄປເພື່ອເກັບກຳສິ່ງທີ່ທ່ານເຄືອນໄຫວໃນໂລກອອນລາຍ. ພວກມັນໄດ້ຮັບການຕິດຕັ້ງໂດຍບຸກຄົນທີ່ສາມເຊັ່ນວ່າ: ຕົວໂຄສະນາ ແລະ ບໍລິສັດວິເຄາະ.
trans-unit.note: Description of cross-site trackers.

trans-unit.source: Cryptominers secretly use your system’s computing power to mine digital money. Cryptomining scripts drain your battery, slow down your computer, and can increase your energy bill.
trans-unit.target: ຕົວຂຸດຫລຽນຄຣິບໂຕຫລັກລອບນຳໃຊ້ລະບົບຄອມພິວເຕີຂອງທ່ານເພື່ອໄປຂຸດເງິນດິຈິຕໍລ. ສະຄຣິບການຂຸດຫລຽນຄຣິບໂຕຈະເຮັດໃຫ້ພະລັງງານແບັດເຕີລີຂອງທ່ານລຸດລົງ, ຄອມພິວເຕີຂອງທ່ານຊ້າລົງ ແລະ ກິນໄຟຟ້າຫລາຍຂື້ນ.
trans-unit.note: Description of cryptominers.

trans-unit.source: The settings on your browser and computer are unique. Fingerprinters collect a variety of these unique settings to create a profile of you, which can be used to track you as you browse.
trans-unit.target: ການຕັ້ງຄ່າໃນບຣາວເຊີ ແລະ ຄອມພິວເຕີຂອງທ່ານບໍ່ຄືໃຜ. ເຄືອງພິມຫລາຍນີ້ວມືຈະຮວບຮ່ວມການຕັ້ງຄ່າທີ່ບໍ່ຄືໃຜຂອງທ່ານໄປສ້າງເປັນໂປຟາຍຂອງທ່ານ ຊຶ່ງສາມາດໃຊ້ຕິດຕາມທ່ານໃນຂະນະທີ່ທ່ານກຳລັງທ່ອງເວັບຢູ່.
trans-unit.note: Description of fingerprinters.

trans-unit.source: Social networks place trackers on other websites to build a more complete and targeted profile of you. Blocking these trackers reduces how much social media companies can see what do you online.
trans-unit.target: ເຄືອຂ່າຍສັງຄົມອອນໄລນຈະວ່າງເຄືອງມືຕິດຕາມໄວ້ຕາມເວັບຕ່າງໆ ເພື່ອສ້າງໂປຣຟາຍຂອງທ່ານໃຫ້ກົງກັບເປົ້າຫມາຍຫລາຍທີ່ສຸດ. ການບັອກຕົວຕິດຕາມເຫລົ່ານີ້ຈະເຮັດໃຫ້ບໍລິສັດສືສັງຄົມອອນໄລນສາມາດເບິງການເຄືອນໄຫວຂອງທ່ານໃນໂຫລກອອນໄລນໄດ້ນ້ອຍລົງ.
trans-unit.note: Description of social network trackers.

trans-unit.target: ເຄືອງພິມລາຍນິ້ວມື
trans-unit.note: The title that shows the number of fingerprinting scripts blocked

trans-unit.source: %@ is asking to download a file and add an event to your calendar.

trans-unit.note: When tapping on a link, on a website in order to download a file and that file is a calendar file, an alert comes up asking to confirm if you want to add the event to the device calendar. This is the body message for the alert. %@ is the name/domain of the website, for example 'google.com'

trans-unit.source: This site is asking to download a file and add an event to your calendar.
trans-unit.target: ເວັບໄຊນີ້ຮ້ອງຂໍໃຫ້ດາວໂຫຼດໄຟລ໌ ແລະ ເພີ່ມນັດໝາຍໃສ່ປະຕິທິນຂອງທ່ານ.
trans-unit.note: When tapping on a link, on a website in order to download a file and that file is a calendar file, an alert comes up asking to confirm if you want to add the event to the device calendar. This is the body message for the alert in case the website doesn't have a base domain.

trans-unit.target: ເພີ່ມ
trans-unit.note: When tapping on a link, on a website in order to download a file and that file is a calendar file, an alert comes up asking to confirm if you want to add the event to the device calendar. This is the affirmative action for the alert, confirming that you do want to add the event to the calendar.

trans-unit.target: ເພີ່ມໃສ່ປະຕິທິນບໍ?
trans-unit.note: When tapping on a link, on a website in order to download a file and that file is a calendar file, an alert comes up asking to confirm if you want to add the event to the device calendar. This is the title for the alert.

trans-unit.source: Close all private tabs and delete history, cookies, and all other site data.

trans-unit.note: When tapping the fire icon in private mode, an alert comes up asking to confirm if you want to delete all browsing data and end your private session. This is the body text for the alert.

trans-unit.note: When tapping the fire icon in private mode, an alert comes up asking to confirm if you want to delete all browsing data and end your private session. This is the cancel action for the alert, cancelling ending your session.

trans-unit.target: ຍົກເລີກ
trans-unit.note: When tapping on a link, on a website in order to download a file and that file is a calendar file, an alert comes up asking to confirm if you want to add the event to the device calendar. trans-unit.target: ບໍ່ຕ້ອງການ

trans-unit.target: ກູ້ຄືນແທັບ
trans-unit.note: The title for the affirmative action of the restore tabs pop-up alert. This alert is displayed when opening up Firefox after it crashed, and will restore existing tabs.

trans-unit.source: Sorry about that. Restore tabs to pick up where you left off.
trans-unit.target: ຂໍອະໄພກ່ຽວກັບເລື່ອງນັ້ນ. ກູ້ແຖບຄືນມາເພື່ອເລືອກບ່ອນທີ່ທ່ານປະໄວ້.
trans-unit.note: The body of the restore tabs pop-up alert. This alert is displayed when opening up Firefox after it crashed.

trans-unit.note: Biometric authentication is when the system prompts users for Face ID or fingerprint before accessing protected information. This string asks the user to enter their device passcode to access the protected screen.

trans-unit.source: Authenticate to access your saved passwords and payment methods.

trans-unit.note: Biometric authentication is when the system prompts users for Face ID or fingerprint before accessing protected information. This string asks the user to enter their device passcode to access the protected screen for logins and encrypted cards.

trans-unit.target: ລຶບ
trans-unit.note: Action button for deleting bookmarks in the bookmarks panel.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete it and its contents?

trans-unit.note: Main body of the confirmation alert when the user tries to delete a folder that still contains bookmarks and/or folders.

trans-unit.note: Title of the confirmation alert when the user tries to delete a folder that still contains bookmarks and/or folders.

trans-unit.source: Add bookmarks as you browse so you can find your favorite sites later.
trans-unit.target: ເພີ່ມບຸກມາກໃນຂະນະທີ່ທ່ານທ່ອງເວັບເພື່ອໃຫ້ທ່ານສາມາຄົ້ນຫາເວັບໄຊທີ່ທ່ານມັກໃນພາຍຫຼັງ.
trans-unit.note: The body text for the placeholder screen shown when there are no saved bookmarks, located within a nested subfolder of the bookmarks panel within the library modal.

trans-unit.target: ໂຟນເດີນີ້ຫວ່າງເປົ່າ
trans-unit.note: The title for the placeholder screen shown when there are no saved bookmarks, located within a nested subfolder of the bookmarks panel within the library modal.

trans-unit.source: Save sites as you browse. We’ll also grab bookmarks from other synced devices.
trans-unit.target: ບັນທຶກເວັບໄຊໃນຂະນະທີ່ທ່ານທ່ອງເວັບ. ພວກເຮົາຍັງຈະຈັບບຸກມາກຈາກອຸປະກອນອື່ນທີ່ຊິ້ງໄວ້.
trans-unit.note: The body text for the placeholder screen shown when there are no saved bookmarks, located at the root level of the bookmarks panel within the library modal.

trans-unit.source: Save sites as you browse. Sign in to grab bookmarks from other synced devices.
trans-unit.target: ບັນທຶກເວັບໄຊໃນຂະນະທີ່ທ່ານທ່ອງເວັບ. ເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບເພື່ອເອົາບຸກມາກຈາກອຸປະກອນອື່ນທີ່ຊິ້ງແລ້ວ.
trans-unit.note: The body text for the placeholder screen shown when the user is signed out and there are no saved bookmarks, located at the root level of the bookmarks panel within the library modal.

trans-unit.target: ເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບເພື່ອ Sync
trans-unit.note: The button title for the sign in button on the placeholder screen shown when there are no saved bookmarks, located at the root level of the bookmarks panel within the library modal. This button triggers the sign in flow, allowing users to sign in to their Mozilla Account to sync data. In this string, "Sync" is used as a verb, and is capitalized as per convention to title case text for buttons in iOS

trans-unit.note: The title for the Delete Bookmark button, in the Edit Bookmark popup screen which is summoned from the main menu's Save submenu, which will delete the currently bookmarked site from the user's bookmarks.

trans-unit.note: When a folder is longpressed in the bookmarks menu, a `Delete Folder` button is present.

trans-unit.note: Label of toast displayed after a bookmark is deleted in the Bookmarks menu. %@ is the name of the bookmark.

trans-unit.target: ແກ້ໄຂບຸກມາກ
trans-unit.note: When a bookmark is longpressed in the bookmarks menu, an `Edit Bookmark` button is present.

trans-unit.target: ປື້ມບັນທຶກຂອງເດັສທັອບ
trans-unit.note: Header denoting that the proceeding folders in the parent folder selector table of the Edit Bookmarks Screen are folders shared with desktop.

trans-unit.target: ບັນທຶກ
trans-unit.note: When editing a bookmark, the right button in the navigation bar indicating that the edited bookmark will be saved.

trans-unit.target: ບັນທຶກໃນ
trans-unit.note: When editing a bookmark, you can select the folder that the bookmark will be saved in. The label for this section of the view is `Save in`.

trans-unit.target: ແກ້ໄຂບຸກມາກ
trans-unit.note: Label on the top of the `Edit Bookmarks` screen.

trans-unit.target: ແກ້ໄຂໂຟນເດີ
trans-unit.note: When a folder is longpressed in the bookmarks menu, an `Edit Folder` button is present.

trans-unit.target: ຕົວເລືອກເພີ່ມເຕີມ
trans-unit.note: Accessibility label for the "..." disclosure button located within every bookmark site cell in the bookmarks panel. Pressing this button opens a modal with more actions.

trans-unit.target: ລຶບອອກຈາກທາງລັດ
trans-unit.note: The title for the unpinning shortcut action in the context menu when tapping on the bookmark's item menu button

trans-unit.target: ບັນທຶກໄວ້ໃນ “ບຸກມາກ”
trans-unit.note: The label displayed in the toast notification when saving a bookmark via the menu to the default folder. "Bookmarks" is the name of the default folder where the bookmark will be saved to.

trans-unit.target: ບັນທຶກໃນ “%@”
trans-unit.note: The label displayed in the toast notification when saving a bookmark via the menu to a custom folder. %@ represents the custom name of the folder, created by the user, where the bookmark will be saved to.

trans-unit.target: ແກ້ໄຂ
trans-unit.note: The title for the Edit context menu action for sites in Home Panels

trans-unit.target: ໃຊ້ທີ່ຢູ່ທີ່ບັນທຶກໄວ້ບໍ?
trans-unit.note: When a user is in the process of entering an address, a screen pops up prompting the user if they want to use a saved address. This string is used as the title label of the screen.

trans-unit.source: Tap here to start a fresh private session. Delete your history, cookies — everything.
trans-unit.target: ແຕະບ່ອນນີ້ເພື່ອເລີ່ມເຊດຊັນສ່ວນຕົວໃໝ່. ລຶບປະຫວັດຂອງທ່ານ, cookies — ທຸກຢ່າງ.
trans-unit.note: Contextual hints are little popups that appear for the users informing them of new features. This is a call to action for the popup that appears to educate users about what the fire button in the toolbar does, when in private mode.

trans-unit.source: Fast, private translations are ready when you are.
trans-unit.target: ໄວ, ການແປພາສາເອກະຊົນແມ່ນກຽມພ້ອມໃນເມື່ອທ່ານພ້ອມ.
trans-unit.note: Contextual hints are little popups that appear for the users informing them of new features. This is the body description of one that points the user to the new translation icon on the toolbar.

trans-unit.target: %@ ເວົ້າພາສາຂອງທ່ານ
trans-unit.note: Contextual hints are little popups that appear for the users informing them of new features. This is the title of one that points the user to the new translation icon on the toolbar. %@ is the app name (e.g. Firefox).

trans-unit.target: ຍົກເລີກ
trans-unit.note: Title label displayed for the cancel action in an alert when the password autofill fails and needs user interaction.

trans-unit.source: There was an issue with autofill. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: ມີບັນຫາກັບການຕື່ມຂໍ້ມູນອັດຕະໂນມັດ. ກະລຸນາລອງອີກຄັ້ງ.
trans-unit.note: Message label displayed for an alert when the password autofill fails and needs user interaction.

trans-unit.target: ລອງໃຫມ່ອີກເທື່ອຫນຶ່ງ
trans-unit.note: Title label displayed for the retry action in an alert when the password autofill fails and needs user interaction.

trans-unit.target: ການຕື່ມຂໍ້ມູນອັດຕະໂນມັດຜິດພາດ
trans-unit.note: Title label displayed for an alert when the password autofill fails and needs user interaction.

trans-unit.source: The passwords you save or sync to %@ will be listed here. All passwords you save are encrypted.
trans-unit.target: ລະ​ຫັດ​ຜ່ານ​ທີ່​ທ່ານ​ບັນ​ທຶກ​ຫຼື sync ກັບ %@ ຈະ​ມີ​ລາຍ​ການ​ຢູ່​ທີ່​ນີ້​. ລະຫັດຜ່ານທັງໝົດທີ່ທ່ານບັນທຶກໄວ້ແມ່ນຖືກເຂົ້າລະຫັດ.
trans-unit.note: Label shown when there are no logins to list. %@ is the app name (e.g. Firefox).

trans-unit.target: ບໍ່ມີລະຫັດຜ່ານທີ່ບັນທຶກໄວ້
trans-unit.note: Label shown when there are no logins saved in the passwords list

trans-unit.target: ບໍ່ພົບລະຫັດຜ່ານ
trans-unit.note: Label displayed when a user searches for an item, and no matches can be found against the search query

trans-unit.target: ຄົ້ນຫາລະຫັດຜ່ານ
trans-unit.note: Placeholder text for search field in the credential provider list

trans-unit.source: To save and automatically fill passwords, enable Face ID, Touch ID, or a device passcode.
trans-unit.target: ເພື່ອບັນທຶກ ແລະ ຕື່ມຂໍ້ມູນໃສ່ລະຫັດຜ່ານໂດຍອັດຕະໂນມັດ, ເປີດໃຊ້ Face ID, Touch ID, ຫຼື ລະຫັດຜ່ານຂອງອຸປະກອນ.
trans-unit.note: Message shown when you enter Logins & Passwords without having a device passcode set.

trans-unit.source: To save and autofill credit cards, enable Face ID, Touch ID, or a device passcode.
trans-unit.target: ເພື່ອບັນທຶກ ແລະ ຕື່ມຂໍ້ມູນບັດເຄຣດິດອັດຕະໂນມັດ, ເປີດໃຊ້ Face ID, Touch ID, ຫຼື ລະຫັດຜ່ານອຸປະກອນ.
trans-unit.note: Message shown when you enter Payment Methods without having a device passcode set.

trans-unit.target: ບຸກມາກ
trans-unit.note: In the settings menu, in the Firefox homepage customization section, this is the title for the option that allows users to toggle Bookmarks section on the Firefox homepage on or off

trans-unit.target: ເລື່ອງລາວ
trans-unit.note: In the settings menu, in the Firefox homepage customization section, this is the title for the option that allows users to turn the Stories recommendations section on the Firefox homepage on or off

trans-unit.target: ບົດຄວາມທີ່ຂັບເຄື່ອນໂດຍ %@
trans-unit.note: In the settings menu, in the Firefox homepage customization section, this is the subtitle for the option that allows users to turn the Pocket Recommendations section on the Firefox homepage on or off. %@ is Pocket.

trans-unit.target: ເລື່ອງລາວທີ່ຈຸດປະກາຍຄວາມຄິດ
trans-unit.note: In the settings menu, in the Firefox homepage customization section, this is the title for the option that allows users to turn the Pocket Recommendations section on the Firefox homepage on or off

trans-unit.target: ເລື່ອງເດັ່ນ​ໆ
trans-unit.note: In the settings menu, in the Firefox homepage customization section, this is the title for the option that allows users to turn the Top Stories recommendations section on the Firefox homepage on or off

trans-unit.target: ໝົດອາຍູ
trans-unit.note: Label for the expiry date of the credit card.

trans-unit.target: ແກ້ໄຂບັດ
trans-unit.note: Title label for the view where user can edit their credit card info

trans-unit.target: ຍົກເລີກ
trans-unit.note: Title for the cancel button in the remove address alert.

trans-unit.source: The address will be removed from all of your synced devices.
trans-unit.target: ທີ່ຢູ່ຈະຖືກລຶບອອກຈາກທຸກອຸປະກອນທີ່ຊິ້ງຂອງທ່ານ.
trans-unit.note: Message explaining the consequences of removing an address from all synced devices.

trans-unit.target: ລຶບ
trans-unit.note: Title for the remove button in the remove address alert.

trans-unit.target: ລຶບທີ່ຢູ່
trans-unit.note: Title for the alert indicating the action to remove an address.

trans-unit.target: ເພີ່ມທີ່ຢູ່
trans-unit.note: Title for the interface option where users can add a new address for autofill purposes. This facilitates quicker form completion by automatically filling in the user's address information.

trans-unit.target: ພື້ນທີ່
trans-unit.note: Label for the area field, allowing users to specify a particular area within a city or region. This detail can improve the specificity and accuracy of autofilled addresses.

trans-unit.target: ເມືອງ
trans-unit.note: Label for the field where users input the city part of their address. This information is crucial for mail delivery and service provision, ensuring accurate city identification in autofill settings.

trans-unit.target: ປະເທດ
trans-unit.note: Label for the field where users can specify just the country, used in contexts where full address details are not required. Simplifies autofill when only country information is necessary.

trans-unit.target: ປະເທດ ຫຼື ພາກພື້ນ
trans-unit.note: Label for the country or region field in address forms, allowing users to specify their country or territorial region. This is fundamental for international mail and services, ensuring autofill accuracy across borders.

trans-unit.target: ປະເທດ
trans-unit.note: Label for the county field, crucial for addressing in regions where county lines play a key role in postal services. Enhances autofill accuracy by including county information.

trans-unit.target: ພະແນກ
trans-unit.note: Label for the department field, used in countries like France and Colombia where departments are a key administrative division. Ensures correct departmental information is autofilled.

trans-unit.target: ແຂວງ
trans-unit.note: Label for the district field in the address form, allowing users to specify their district for more precise location identification. This aids in refining address details for accurate autofill.

trans-unit.target: Do/Si
trans-unit.note: Label for the Do/Si field, pertinent to addresses in South Korea. Do/Si refers to provincial level divisions, and specifying this enhances address accuracy in autofill settings.

trans-unit.target: Eircode
trans-unit.note: Label for the Eircode field, specific to Ireland. It's a unique postal code system that helps in precise location identification, enhancing the effectiveness of autofill.

trans-unit.target: ອີເມລ
trans-unit.note: Label for the email address field, where users input their email. Critical for digital communication and account verification, this ensures email addresses are autofilled accurately.

trans-unit.target: Emirate
trans-unit.note: Label for the emirate field, essential for addresses in the United Arab Emirates. Including emirate details ensures the autofill feature accurately represents user addresses.

trans-unit.target: ເກາະ
trans-unit.note: Label for the field where users specify the name of an island, if applicable. Important for addresses in archipelagic regions, aiding in precise location identification during autofill.
Label for the field where the user inputs their full name as part of an address form. Essential for personalized form submissions and ensuring information accuracy in autofilled forms.

trans-unit.target: ບ້ານໃກ້ເຮືອນຄຽງ
trans-unit.note: Label for the field where users can input the name of their neighborhood. This detail adds precision to addresses, especially in densely populated areas, improving the accuracy of autofill.

trans-unit.target: ເຂດ
trans-unit.note: Label for the oblast field, relevant for addresses in countries like Russia and Ukraine. Oblasts are a significant administrative division, and their specification aids in autofill accuracy.

trans-unit.target: ອົງກອນ
trans-unit.note: Label for the input field designated for the organization's name related to the address. Helps in distinguishing addresses used for business or personal purposes in autofill settings.

trans-unit.target: ເມືອງ
trans-unit.note: Label for the parish field, significant in places where parishes are used for local administration and addressing. Ensures users can specify parish details for better autofill accuracy.

trans-unit.target: ປັກໝຸດ
trans-unit.note: Label for the PIN (Postal Index Number) field, used in India. It's a code representing a specific area, crucial for accurate mail delivery and autofill functionality.

trans-unit.target: ເມືອງ
trans-unit.note: Label for the post town field, used primarily in the UK and some other regions for mail sorting. Essential for users in applicable areas to specify for correct mail delivery through autofill.

trans-unit.target: ລະ​ຫັດ​ໄປ​ສະ​ນີ
trans-unit.note: Label for the postal code field, universally used in address forms to specify the area code for mail sorting. Essential for autofill to ensure mail and services are accurately routed.

trans-unit.target: ແຂວງ
trans-unit.note: Label for the prefecture field, essential for addresses in countries like Japan where prefectures are a major administrative division. Aids in precise location specification for autofill.

trans-unit.target: ແຂວງ
trans-unit.note: Label for the province field, required in countries where provinces are a primary administrative division. Helps in pinpointing the user's location more accurately for autofill purposes.

trans-unit.target: ລັດ
trans-unit.note: Label for the state field, a necessary component of addresses in many countries, especially the USA. It ensures that state-specific details are correctly filled in forms using autofill.

trans-unit.target: ຊານເມືອງ
trans-unit.note: Label for the suburb field, enabling users to add suburb details to their address. This is important for accurate delivery and services in suburban areas, enhancing autofill functionality.

trans-unit.target: ໂທລະສັບ
trans-unit.note: Label for the telephone number field, allowing users to input their contact number. This is essential for communication and service provision, ensuring contact details are autofilled correctly.

trans-unit.target: ບ້ານເມືອງ
trans-unit.note: Label for the input field for the townland, a specific type of land division used in rural areas. Enhances address detail for users in regions where townlands are a common addressing component.

trans-unit.target: ບ້ານ ຫຼື ເມືອງ
trans-unit.note: Label for the field to input the name of a village or township. This is crucial for addresses in rural areas, ensuring the autofill feature accurately captures all necessary geographical details.

trans-unit.target: ລະຫັດໄປສະນີ
trans-unit.note: Label for the ZIP code field, primarily used in the United States for mail sorting. Key for autofill to accurately complete addresses for shipping, billing, and service provision.

trans-unit.target: ຍົກເລີກ
trans-unit.note: Label for the button to cancel the current autofill operation or exit the form without saving changes. Provides users with an option to back out of a process without making any modifications.

trans-unit.target: ແກ້ໄຂທີ່ຢູ່
trans-unit.note: Title for the option allowing users to edit an existing saved address. This is used within the settings for autofill, enabling users to update their address details for accurate form autofilling.

trans-unit.target: ທີ່​ຢູ່​ຖະ​ຫນົນ
trans-unit.note: Title for the input field where users can enter their street address. This is used within the settings for autofill, allowing users to provide their street address for accurate form autofilling.

trans-unit.target: ບັນທຶກ
trans-unit.note: Label for the button to save the current address details entered or edited by the user. This action confirms the user's changes and updates their autofill settings accordingly.

trans-unit.target: ເບິ່ງທີ່ຢູ່
trans-unit.note: Title for the option allowing users to view an existing saved address. This is used within the settings for autofill, enabling users to see their address details for accurate form autofilling.

trans-unit.target: ປິດ
trans-unit.note: Button label for closing the view where user can view their address info.

trans-unit.target: ແກ້ໄຂ
trans-unit.note: Button label for editing the address details shown in the form.

trans-unit.target: ລຶບທີ່ຢູ່
trans-unit.note: Title for button that offers the user the option to remove an address.

trans-unit.target: ລຶບທີ່ຢູ່ອອກແລ້ວ
trans-unit.note: Toast message confirming that an address has been successfully removed.

trans-unit.target: ທີ່ຢູ່ບໍ່ສາມາດຖືກບັນທຶກໄວ້ໄດ້
trans-unit.note: Toast message indicating an error occurred while trying to save an address.

trans-unit.target: ທີ່ຢູ່ບໍ່ສາມາດເອົາອອກໄດ້
trans-unit.note: Toast message indicating an error occurred while trying to remove an address.

trans-unit.target: ລອງໃຫມ່ອີກຄັ້ງ
trans-unit.note: Suggestion to try again after an error occurred while trying to save an address.

trans-unit.target: ບັນທຶກທີ່ຢູ່ແລ້ວ
trans-unit.note: Toast message confirming that an address has been successfully saved.

trans-unit.target: ອັບເດດຂໍ້ມູນທີ່ຢູ່
trans-unit.note: Toast message confirming that an address has been successfully updated.

trans-unit.target: ບັນທຶກທີ່ຢູ່ແລ້ວ
trans-unit.note: Toast message confirming that an address has been successfully updated.

trans-unit.target: ເພີ່ມບັດ
trans-unit.note: Title label for the view where user can add their credit card info

trans-unit.target: ບັນທຶກ ແລະ ຕື່ມຂໍ້ມູນໃສ່ວິທີການຊໍາລະ

trans-unit.source: Find something nearby. Or discover something fun.

trans-unit.note: Body of notification sent to user after inactivity to encourage them to use the search feature.

trans-unit.note: Title of notification sent to user after inactivity to encourage them to use the search feature.

trans-unit.source: Private browsing in %@ doesn’t save your info and blocks hidden trackers.
trans-unit.target: ການທ່ອງເວັບສ່ວນຕົວໃນ %@ ບໍ່ໄດ້ບັນທຶກຂໍ້ມູນຂອງທ່ານ ແລະ ບລັອກຕົວຕິດຕາມທີ່ເຊື່ອງໄວ້.
trans-unit.note: Body of notification sent to user after inactivity to encourage them to use the private browsing feature. %@ is the app name (e.g. Firefox).

trans-unit.note: Title of notification sent to user after inactivity to encourage them to use the private browsing feature.

trans-unit.source: Browse with no saved cookies or history in %@.

trans-unit.source: Removing cookies and site data for %@ might log you out of websites and clear shopping carts.
trans-unit.target: ການລຶບຄຸກກີ້ ແລະ ຂໍ້ມູນເວັບໄຊສຳລັບ %@ ອາດຈະເຮັດໃຫ້ທ່ານອອກຈາກລະບົບເວັບໄຊ ແລະ ລຶບລ້າງກະຕ່າຊື້ເຄື່ອງ.
trans-unit.note: The text for the clear cookies and site data alert inside the enhanced tracking protection screen. %@ is the currently visited website.

trans-unit.target: ລຶບລ້າງຄຸກກີ້ ແລະ ຂໍ້ມູນເວັບໄຊ
trans-unit.note: The title for the clear cookies and site data alert inside the enhanced tracking protection screen.

trans-unit.target: ລຶບລ້າງຄຸກກີ້ ແລະ ຂໍ້ມູນເວັບໄຊ
trans-unit.note: The title for the clear cookies and site data button inside the enhanced tracking protection screen.

trans-unit.target: ລຶບຄຸກກີ້ ແລະ ຂໍ້ມູນເວັບໄຊອອກ
trans-unit.note: The text for the clear cookies and site data toast that appears when the user selects to clear the cookies

trans-unit.target: ປິດເມນູຄວາມເປັນສ່ວນຕົວ ແລະ ຄວາມປອດໄພ

trans-unit.note: Text to let users know that the current website is secure.

trans-unit.note: Text to let users know that the current website is not secure.

trans-unit.note: Text to let users know how many cross-site tracking cookies were blocked on the current website. %@ is the number of cookies of this type detected.

trans-unit.target: ລາຍນິ້ວມື: %@
trans-unit.note: Text to let users know how many fingerprinters were blocked on the current website. %@ is the number of fingerprinters detected.

trans-unit.target: ຕົວຕິດຕາມສື່ສັງຄົມ: %@
trans-unit.note: Text to let users know how many social media trackers were blocked on the current website. %@ is the number of cookies of this type detected.

trans-unit.target: ບລັອກຕົວຕິດຕາມແລ້ວ: %@
trans-unit.note: Text to let users know how many trackers were blocked on the current website. %@ is the number of trackers blocked.

trans-unit.note: Text to let users know the site verifier, where %@ represents the SSL certificate signer which is on the enhanced tracking protection screen after the user taps on the connection details.

trans-unit.target: ເບິ່ງໃບຮັບຮອງ
trans-unit.note: The title for the button that allows users to view certificates inside the enhanced tracking protection details screen.

trans-unit.source: %@ is off-duty. We suggest turning protections back on.
trans-unit.target: %@ ຖືກປິດ. ພວກເຮົາແນະນຳໃຫ້ເປີດການປ້ອງກັນຄືນໃໝ່.
trans-unit.note: Header for the enhanced tracking protection screen when the user has opted out of the feature. %@ is the app name (e.g. Firefox).

trans-unit.target: ທ່ານໄດ້ປິດການປ້ອງກັນ
trans-unit.note: Title for the enhanced tracking protection screen when the user has opted out of the feature.

trans-unit.source: You’re protected. If we spot something, we’ll let you know.
trans-unit.target: ທ່ານໄດ້ຮັບການປ້ອງກັນ. ຖ້າພວກເຮົາພົບເຫັນບາງສິ່ງບາງຢ່າງ, ພວກເຮົາຈະແຈ້ງໃຫ້ທ່ານຮູ້.
trans-unit.note: Header for the enhanced tracking protection screen when the user has selected to be protected.

trans-unit.target: ການເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ຂອງທ່ານບໍ່ປອດໄພ.
trans-unit.note: Header for the enhanced tracking protection screen when the user has selected to be protected but the connection is not secure.

trans-unit.target: ຈົ່ງລະມັດລະວັງໃນເວັບໄຊທ໌ນີ້
trans-unit.note: Title for the enhanced tracking protection screen when the user has selected to be protected but the connection is not secure.

trans-unit.target: %@ ໄດ້ຮັບການຕິດຕາມ
trans-unit.note: Title for the enhanced tracking protection screen when the user has selected to be protected. %@ is the app name (e.g. Firefox).

trans-unit.target: ການຕັ້ງຄ່າຄວາມເປັນສ່ວນຕົວ
trans-unit.note: The title for the privacy settings button inside the enhanced tracking protection screen.

trans-unit.target: ປັບປຸງການປ້ອງກັນການຕິດຕາມ
trans-unit.note: Title for the switch to enable/disable enhanced tracking protection inside the menu.

trans-unit.source: Protections are OFF. We suggest turning them back on.
trans-unit.target: ການປ້ອງກັນຖືກປິດໄວ້. ພວກເຮົາແນະນຳໃຫ້ເປີດການປ້ອງກັນຄືນໃໝ່.
trans-unit.note: A switch to disable enhanced tracking protection inside the menu.

trans-unit.source: If something looks broken on this site, try turning it off.
trans-unit.target: ຖ້າມີບາງຢ່າງຜິດປົກກະຕິຢູ່ໃນເວັບໄຊທ໌ນີ້, ໃຫ້ລອງປິດມັນ.
trans-unit.note: A switch to disable enhanced tracking protection inside the menu.

trans-unit.target: ໃສ່ວັນໝົດອາຍຸທີ່ຖືກຕ້ອງ

trans-unit.source: Open email in the default mail application?

trans-unit.target: ເລື່ອງລາວ
trans-unit.note: This is the title of the Pocket section on Firefox Homepage.

trans-unit.source: We’ve updated our %1$@ to reflect the latest features in %2$@. %3$@
trans-unit.note: Body label for the Privacy Notice card showed at the top of the homepage notifying users that the Privacy Notice has been updated. The %1$@ placeholder is for the string “Privacy Notice” which will contain a link to the updated privacy notice. The %2$@ placeholder is for the app name (e.g. Firefox). The %3$@ placeholder is for the string “Learn More” which will contain a link to specifically what has changed in the updated Privacy Notice

Label for the “Learn More” link inserted into the second placeholder of the Privacy Notice body label. This text will appear as a tappable link directing users to detailed information about what has changed in the updated Privacy Notice.
Label for the “Privacy Notice” link inserted into the first placeholder of the Privacy Notice body label. This text will appear as a tappable link that opens the updated Firefox Privacy Notice.

trans-unit.note: This is the title for the button next to the stories section title on Firefox Homepage that, when tapped, transitions you to the Top Stories view which displays a collection of trending news articles.

trans-unit.target: ເລື່ອງທັງໝົດ
trans-unit.note: This is the title that appears in the navigation bar for the All Stories view, a screen that displays a collection of trending news articles

trans-unit.target: ລຶບຂໍ້ມູນການຄົ້ນຫາສ່ວນຕົວແລ້ວ
trans-unit.note: When the user ends their private session, they are returned to the private mode homepage, and a toastbar popups confirming that their data has been erased. This is the label for that toast.

trans-unit.source: %@ deletes your cookies, history, and site data when you close all your private tabs.
trans-unit.target: %@ ລຶບຄຸກກີ້, ປະຫວັດການນຳໃຊ້, ແລະ ຂໍ້ມູນເວັບໄຊທຂອງທ່ານ ເມື່ອທ່ານປິດແຖບສ່ວນຕົວທັງໝົດຂອງທ່ານ.
trans-unit.note: The body of the message for the card that educates users about how private mode works. The card shows up on the homepage when in the new privacy mode. %@ is the app name (e.g. Firefox).

trans-unit.source: Who might be able to see my activity?
trans-unit.target: ມີໃຜແດ່ທີ່ອາດຈະສາມາດເຫັນກິດຈະກໍາຂອງຂ້ອຍໄດ້?
trans-unit.note: The link for the card that educates users about how private mode works. The link redirects to an external site for more information. The card shows up on the homepage when in the new privacy mode.

trans-unit.source: Leave no traces on this device

trans-unit.note: The title for the card that educates users about how private mode works. The card shows up on the homepage when in the new privacy mode.

trans-unit.note: Toggle for credit cards syncing setting

trans-unit.target: ຮຽນຮູ້ເພີ່ມເຕີມ

trans-unit.source: Powered by %1$@. Part of the %2$@ family.
trans-unit.target: ຂັບເຄື່ອນໂດຍ %1$@. ສ່ວນໜຶ່ງຂອງຄອບຄົວ %2$@.
trans-unit.note: This is the title of the Pocket footer on Firefox Homepage. %1$@ is Pocket, %2$@ is the app name (e.g. Firefox).

trans-unit.note: Title of notification shown when a remote device has requested to close a number of tabs. %1$@ is the app name (e.g. Firefox). %2$@ is the number of tabs.

trans-unit.target: ເບິ່ງແຖບທີ່ປິດບໍ່ດົນມານີ້
trans-unit.note: Label for an action used to view recently closed tabs.

trans-unit.source: Meet your personalized homepage. Recent tabs, bookmarks, and search results will appear here.
trans-unit.target: ພົບກັບໜ້າຫຼັກທີ່ເປັນສ່ວນຕົວຂອງທ່ານ. ແຖບຫຼ້າສຸດ, ບຸກມາກ, ແລະຜົນການຊອກຫາຈະປາກົດຢູ່ບ່ອນນີ້.
trans-unit.note: Contextual hints are little popups that appear for the users informing them of new features. This one talks about additions to the Firefox homepage regarding a more personalized experience.

trans-unit.source: Your tabs are syncing! Pick up where you left off on your other device.
trans-unit.target: ແຖບຂອງທ່ານກຳລັງຊິ້ງຢູ່! ເອົາບ່ອນທີ່ເຈົ້າຄ້າງໄວ້ໃນອຸປະກອນອື່ນຂອງເຈົ້າ.
trans-unit.note: Contextual hints are little popups that appear for the users informing them of new features. When a user is logged in and has a tab synced from desktop, this popup indicates which tab that is within the Jump Back In section.

trans-unit.target: ຊ່ອງແບບຟອມຕໍ່ໄປ
trans-unit.note: Accessibility label for next button that is displayed above the keyboard when a form field on a website was tapped.

trans-unit.source: New! %@ Relay email masks are now available on mobile.

trans-unit.source: Your 5 free email masks are in use, so we picked one for you.
trans-unit.note: Message displayed to users when they attempt to generate a new Relay email mask but they have reached their free tier 5 mask limit, and so an existing mask is chosen for them randomly.

trans-unit.source: Email masks aren’t available right now. Try again in a few minutes.
trans-unit.note: Generic error message displayed to users when an unexpected error occurs while attempting to generate a Relay email mask.
VoiceOver announcement spoken aloud to accessibility users when an email mask is inserted successfully.

trans-unit.source: Hide your real email to protect your inbox from spam. Some sites don’t support it.

trans-unit.source: Hide your real email to protect your inbox from spam. Some sites don’t support email masks.
trans-unit.note: Detailed informational label to explain the Relay anonymous email masking feature to users, and warn that some websites may not support that functionality.
Website link title that takes users to a website to learn additional information about the Relay email mask feature.
Button title which takes users to a webpage to manage their Relay email masks and related settings.
Title for settings related to Relay email masking, which provides options for enabling or disabling the suggestion of anonymous email masks services via Relay.
Label for settings toggle which allows users to enable or disable the suggestion of Relay email masks on registration forms, to provide anonymous email masking.

Displayed inside the keyboard hint when a user is entering an email in a web form. Indicates that the user has the option to use an anonymous Relay email mask instead of their personal email. Tapping on this option will populate the field with a Relay mask automatically.

trans-unit.note: When a user is in the process or has finished making a purchase with a card not saved in Firefox's list of stored cards, we ask the user if they would like to save this card for future purchases. trans-unit.target: ອັບເດດບັດບໍ?
trans-unit.note: When a user is in the process or has finished making a purchase with a remembered card, and if the credit card information doesn't match the contents of the stored information of that card, we show this string. trans-unit.source: Try out features and ideas before they’re released to everyone.

trans-unit.source: %@ randomly selects users to test features, which improves quality for everyone.

Label used as a toggle item in Settings. When this is off, the user is opting out of all studies.

trans-unit.source: Shake your device from side to side to summarize a page.

trans-unit.source: Data about your device, hardware configuration, and usage helps us improve %@ features, performance and stability.
trans-unit.target: ຂໍ້​ມູນ​ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ອຸ​ປະ​ກອນ​ຂອງ​ທ່ານ​, ການ​ຕັ້ງ​ຄ່າ​ຮາດ​ແວ​, ແລະ ​ການ​ນໍາ​ໃຊ້​ຊ່ວຍ​ໃຫ້​ພວກ​ເຮົາ​ປັບ​ປຸງ %@ ຄຸນ​ນະ​ສົມ​ບັດ​, ປະ​ສິດ​ທິ​ພາບ​ ແລະ​ ຄວາມ​ສະຖຽນ.
trans-unit.note: On the Settings screen, this is the subtitle text for a toggle which controls sending technical and interaction data. %@ is the app name (e.g. Firefox).

trans-unit.target: ສົ່ງຂໍ້ມູນດ້ານວິຊາການ ແລະ ການໂຕ້ຕອບ

This is the title for the setting that toggles the Translation feature that allows users to translate web pages under the Translation settings section.

trans-unit.target: WhatsApp
trans-unit.note: The name of WhatsApp, a popular instant messaging and video calling app.

trans-unit.source: Spread the word about %1$@ every time you share a link on %2$@.
trans-unit.target: ເຜີຍແຜ່ກ່ຽວກັບ %1$@ ທຸກໆຄັ້ງທີ່ທ່ານແບ່ງປັນລິ້ງໃນ %2$@.
trans-unit.note: On the Settings screen, this is the subtitle text for a toggle which controls adding additional text to links shared to social media apps. %1$@ is the app name (e.g. Firefox). %2$@ is the social media app name (e.g. WhatsApp).

trans-unit.target: ລວມເອົາ %1$@ ລິ້ງດາວໂຫຼດຢູ່ໃນ %2$@ Shares
trans-unit.note: On the Settings screen, this is the title text for a toggle which controls adding additional text to links shared to social media apps. %1$@ is the app name (e.g. Firefox). %2$@ is the social media app name (e.g. WhatsApp).

trans-unit.source: %1$@ Sent from %2$@ 🦊 Try the mobile browser: %3$@
trans-unit.target: %1$@ ສົ່ງມາຈາກ %2$@ 🦊 ລອງໃຊ້ໂປຣແກຣມທ່ອງເວັບໃນມືຖື: %3$@
trans-unit.note: When a user shares a link to social media, this is the shared text they'll see in the social media app. %1$@ is the shared website's URL. %2$@ is the app name (e.g. Firefox). %3$@ is the link to download the app.

%1$@

trans-unit.note: When a user shares a link to social media, this is the shared text they'll see in the social media app. %1$@ is the shared website's URL. %2$@ is the app name (e.g. Firefox). %3$@ is the link to download the app. The ' ' symbols denote empty lines separating the first link parameter from the rest of the text.

When a user shares a link to social media, this is the shared text they'll see in the social media app. %1$@ is the shared website's URL. %2$@ is the app name (e.g. Firefox). %3$@ is the link to download the app.

trans-unit.target: X
trans-unit.note: Title for X (formerly Twitter) tile in the suggested sites section of the homepage.

trans-unit.source: Tap to summarize this page. Touch and hold for Reader View.
trans-unit.target: ແຕະເພື່ອສະຫຼຸບໜ້ານີ້. ແຕະຄ້າງໄວ້ເພື່ອເບິ່ງ Reader View.
trans-unit.note: Contextual hints are little popups that appear for the users informing them of new features. This is the description of one that points the user to the summarize button on the new toolbar layout.

trans-unit.target: ສະຫຼຸບໂດຍ Apple Intelligence
trans-unit.note: The label displayed in the summary report when the summary was generated using Apple Intelligence.
The a11y label for the close button in the summary view.

trans-unit.target: ປິດ
trans-unit.note: The label for the error button that allows the user to close the summary view because there is an error summarizing the page and the summary cannot be retried.

trans-unit.source: Page is still loading. Wait for it to finish, then hit summarize.
trans-unit.target: ໜ້າກຳລັງໂຫຼດຢູ່. ລໍຖ້າໃຫ້ມັນຈົບ, ຈາກນັ້ນກົດສະຫຼຸບ.
trans-unit.note: The error message displayed when the summarizer encounters missing page content while summarizing a page (e.g the page is still loading).

trans-unit.source: Can’t handle this one at the moment. Try again later!
trans-unit.target: ບໍ່ສາມາດຈັດການກັບອັນນີ້ໃນເວລານີ້. ລອງໃໝ່ໃນພາຍຫຼັງ!
trans-unit.note: The error message displayed when the summarizer encounters a rate limit while summarizing a page.

trans-unit.source: Error summarizing page. Try again later.
trans-unit.target: ເກີດຄວາມຜິດພາດໃນການສະຫຼຸບໜ້າ. ລອງໃໝ່ໃນພາຍຫຼັງ.
trans-unit.note: The error message displayed when the summarizer encounters an unknown error while summarizing a page.

trans-unit.source: Limited content detected. This page may be restricted or mostly visual.
trans-unit.target: ກວດພົບເນື້ອຫາຈຳກັດ. ໜ້ານີ້ອາດຈະຖືກຈຳກັດ ຫຼື ສ່ວນຫຼາຍແມ່ນເປັນພາບ.
trans-unit.note: The error message displayed when the summarizer encounters unsafe content while summarizing a page.

trans-unit.source: This website doesn’t allow content summarization. Try a different page.
trans-unit.target: ເວັບໄຊທ໌ນີ້ບໍ່ອະນຸຍາດໃຫ້ສະຫຼຸບເນື້ອໃນ. ລອງໜ້າອື່ນ.
trans-unit.note: The error message displayed when the summarizer encounters unsupported content while summarizing a page (e.g unsupported language, content too long).

trans-unit.target: ຫມາຍເຫດ: ການສະຫຼຸບສາມາດເຮັດໃຫ້ມີຂໍ້ຜິດພາດ.
trans-unit.note: The description is displayed at the end of the summary report as a footnote to the users in that the report can contain errors.

trans-unit.target: ສະຫຼຸບໂດຍ %@
trans-unit.note: The label displayed in the summary report when the summary was generated using by a third-party service. %@ refers to the name of the service/app (e.g Firefox).
The a11y label for the loading label on the summarize loading screen.

trans-unit.target: ກຳລັງສະຫຼຸບ…
trans-unit.note: When the user uses the summarizing feature, this is the loading label that is shown while the summarization is being performed.
The a11y label for the retry button in the summary view when the summarizer fails with an error that allows retrying to summarize the page.

trans-unit.target: ລອງໃໝ່
trans-unit.note: The label for the error button that allows the user to retry summarizing the page.

trans-unit.source: Drag or tap the web page to close the summary
trans-unit.note: The a11y label for the web page view that shows on top of the summary view. Tapping or dragging on the view will close the summary page.

trans-unit.target: ອະນຸຍາດ
trans-unit.note: The label for the allow button on the Terms of Service alert.

trans-unit.source: %@ uses Apple Intelligence to summarize pages.
trans-unit.target: %@ ໃຊ້ Apple Intelligence ເພື່ອສະຫຼຸບໜ້າ.
trans-unit.note: The message for the Terms of Service alert that asks the user if they want to allow page summaries with Apple Intelligence. %@ is the app name (e.g Firefox).

trans-unit.target: ຍົກເລີກ
trans-unit.note: The label for the cancel button on the Terms of Service alert for the summarizer.

trans-unit.target: ສືບຕໍ່
trans-unit.note: The label for the continue button on the Terms of Service alert.

trans-unit.source: %@ uses cloud-based AI to summarize pages, and returns those summaries to your device.
trans-unit.target: %@ ໃຊ້ AI ທີ່ອີງໃສ່ຄລາວເພື່ອສະຫຼຸບໜ້າ, ແລະ ສົ່ງຄືນບົດສະຫຼຸບເຫຼົ່ານັ້ນໄປຫາອຸປະກອນຂອງທ່ານ.
trans-unit.note: The message for the Terms of Service alert that asks the user if they want to allow page summaries with Firefox AI. %@ is the app name (e.g Firefox).

trans-unit.target: ຮຽນຮູ້ເພີ່ມເຕີມ
trans-unit.note: The label for the learn more link button on the Terms of Service alert for the summarizer.

trans-unit.target: ອະນຸຍາດໃຫ້ສະຫຼຸບຫນ້າບໍ?
trans-unit.note: The title for the Terms of Service alert that asks the user if they want to allow page summaries.

trans-unit.target: ມັນເຮັດວຽກແນວໃດ
trans-unit.note: The label for the learn more link button on the Terms of Service alert for the summarizer.
The a11y label for the allow button on the info panel when the user has not yet accepted the ToS.

trans-unit.target: ສືບຕໍ່
trans-unit.note: The label for the accept button in the info panel in the summarizer when the user has not yet accepted the ToS.

trans-unit.source: See the main points in seconds with %@.
trans-unit.target: ເບິ່ງຈຸດຕົ້ນຕໍໃນວິນາທີດ້ວຍ %@.
trans-unit.note: The message for the Terms of Service alert that asks the user if they want to continue to summarize the page. %@ is the app name (e.g Firefox).

trans-unit.target: ສະຫຼຸບໜ້ານີ້ບໍ?
trans-unit.note: The title for the Terms of Service information panel that asks the user if they want to summarize this page.

trans-unit.source: Double tap and hold for more options
trans-unit.target: ແຕະສອງເທື່ອຄ້າງໄວ້ສຳລັບທາງເລືອກເພີ່ມເຕີມ
trans-unit.note: Accessibility hint for the reload button

trans-unit.source: Connection not secure. Enhanced Tracking Protection is off.

trans-unit.source: Secure connection. Enhanced Tracking Protection is off.
trans-unit.target: ການເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ທີ່ປອດໄພ. ການປົກປ້ອງການຕິດຕາມທີ່ປັບປຸງດີຂຶ້ນປິດຢູ່.
trans-unit.note: Accessibility label for the security icon in url bar

trans-unit.target: ການເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ບໍ່ປອດໄພ
trans-unit.note: Accessibility label for the security icon in url bar

trans-unit.target: ການເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ທີປອດໄພ
trans-unit.note: Accessibility label for the security icon in url bar

trans-unit.target: ການປ້ອງກັນການຕິດຕາມ
trans-unit.note: Accessibility label for the lock / tracking protection button on the URL bar

trans-unit.target: ການປ້ອງກັນການຕິດຕາມ
trans-unit.note: Large content title for the lock button. This title is displayed when accessible font sizes are enabled

trans-unit.target: ແບ່ງປັນຫນ້ານີ້
trans-unit.note: Accessibility label for the share button in url bar

trans-unit.target: ແບ່ງປັນ
trans-unit.note: Large content title for the share button. This title is displayed when using accessible font sizes is enabled

trans-unit.target: ສະແດງແຖບ: %@
trans-unit.note: Large content title for the tabs button. %@ is the number of open tabs or an infinity symbol. This title is displayed when using accessible font sizes is enabled.

trans-unit.target: ລືບຫນ້ານີ້
trans-unit.note: Large content title for the button shown in editing mode to remove this site from the top sites panel.

trans-unit.target: ເອົາກັບຄືນ
trans-unit.note: When the user closes tabs in the tab tray, a popup will appear. This is the title for the button to undo the deletion of those tabs

trans-unit.target: ປິດແຖບແລ້ວ
trans-unit.note: When the user closes an individual tab in the tab tray, a popup will appear informing them the tab was closed. This is the text for the popup.

trans-unit.target: ແຖບປິດແລ້ວ: %d
trans-unit.note: When the user closes tabs in the tab tray, a popup will appear informing them how many tabs were closed. This is the text for the popup. %d is the number of tabs.

trans-unit.target: ປິດ
trans-unit.note: This is the swipe action title for closing an inactive tab by swiping, located in the Inactive Tabs section of the Tabs Tray

trans-unit.target: ແທັບ
trans-unit.note: The title on the button to look at regular tabs.

trans-unit.target: ຊິງຄ
trans-unit.note: The title on the button to look at synced tabs.

trans-unit.target: ປິດແທັບເກົ່າ…
trans-unit.note: Text for a button in the tabs tray used to open another menu to close older tabs.
Text for a button in the tabs tray used delete current active tabs. %@ is for the number of tabs that will be going to be closed.

trans-unit.target: ປິດແທັບທີ່ເກົ່າກວ່າ…
trans-unit.note: Text for the menu title under the tabs tray in which users can close tabs older than a certain period of time.

trans-unit.target: 1 ມື້ກ່ອນ
trans-unit.note: The label for a button that closes tabs older than 1 day ago. Shown in a menu under the tabs tray.

trans-unit.target: 1 ເດືອນກ່ອນ
trans-unit.note: The label for a button that closes tabs older than 1 month ago. Shown in a menu under the tabs tray.

trans-unit.target: 1 ອາທິດກ່ອນ
trans-unit.note: The label for a button that closes tabs older than 1 week ago. Shown in a menu under the tabs tray.

trans-unit.target: %1$@ ຈາກທັງໝົດ %2$@
trans-unit.note: Message spoken by VoiceOver saying the position of the currently selected page in the tab tray selector (%1$@), along with the total number of selector (%2$@). E.g. “1 of 3” says that page 1 is visible, out of 3 pages total.

trans-unit.source: Turn on tab syncing to view a list of tabs from your other devices.
trans-unit.target: ເປີດການຊິງຄ໌ແທັບເພື່ອເບິ່ງລາຍການແທັບທີ່ເປີດຢູ່ໃນອຸປະກອນອື່ນໆຂອງທ່ານ.

On top of the bottom toolbar, there can be a translations banner, this is the accessibility label for the close button that appears on the banner that allows the user to dismiss the translations banner.

On top of the bottom toolbar, there can be a translations banner, this is the title for the text that appears on the banner to inform the user that the page has been translated to another language. %1$@ is the original language and %2$@ is the language that the page was translated to.

On top of the bottom toolbar, there can be a translations banner, this is the title for the text that appears on the banner to inform the user that they hit an error or issue when trying to translate the page.
On top of the bottom toolbar, there can be a translations banner, this is the accessibility label for the loading button that appears when the page is being translated.
On top of the bottom toolbar, there can be a translations banner, this is the accessibility label for the chevron button that navigates the user to the translation settings page.

trans-unit.target: ລອງໃໝ່
trans-unit.note: On top of the bottom toolbar, there can be a translations banner, this is the title for the button that appears on the banner that allows the user to try to translate a page again after facing an error.

On top of the bottom toolbar, there can be a translations banner, this is the title for the text that appears on the banner to inform the user that they can translate the page to another language. %@ is the other language (e.g. English).
On top of the bottom toolbar, there can be a translations banner, this is the title for the button that appears on the banner that allows the user to tap on and translate the webpage.
This is the text on the button used to translate a page from one language to another and the button is shown on the translation feature bottom sheet view.
This is the text for the cell that indicates that a user can choose a language to translate from, as part of the bottom sheet view for the translations feature.

trans-unit.target: ກະລຸນາລອງອີກຄັ້ງ.

trans-unit.target: ລອງໃໝ່

trans-unit.source: Check your internet connection and try again.

On the translation feature bottom sheet, this is the text for the error message that appears when a user has no internet connection when trying to translate a page.
This is a less descriptive text for the cell that allows users to select what language they want to translate the page from, as part of the bottom sheet view for the translations feature.
This is the text on the secondary button used to indicate that page is being translated and the button is shown on the translation feature bottom sheet view.

This is the accessibility label to announce that the page is translated and loading is completed. From a user perspective, they will see the translation icon go from loading state to active state, which means we received the a valid translation response from translating the page.
This is the text on the secondary button used to restore the translated page to its original language and the button is shown on the translation feature bottom sheet view.
This is the title for the bottom sheet view that allows users to configure their language preferences for the translations feature.
This is the less descriptive text for the cell that allows users to select what language they want to translate the page to, as part of the bottom sheet view for the translations feature.

This is the accessibility label for the cell that allows users to select what language they want to translate the page from, as part of the bottom sheet view for the translations feature. %@ is the language selected (e.g. English).
This is the text for the cell that allows users to select what language they want to translate the page from, as part of the bottom sheet view for the translations feature.

This is the accessibility label for the cell that allows users to select what language they want to translate the page to, as part of the bottom sheet view for the translations feature. %@ is the language selected (e.g. English).
This is the text for the cell that allows users to select what language they want to translate the page to, as part of the bottom sheet view for the translations feature.
